tag.v: I am the owner of Yoga Mind Yoga Body. Ombra Cafe is located north of me in the adjoining townhouse. I will add it back in the correct location (couldn't figure out how to move the marker).
Yoga Studio for private instruction by appointment only. Yoga teacher Gernot Huber also teaches public drop-in classes at The Yoga Tree and at Wild Rose Yoga, both in the old city (inside the moat).
